sentence.Network_en: His house was the only settled home I had as a child.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的房子是我儿时唯一固定的家。

sentence.Network_en: He got his coffee, came back and settled down to listen.
sentence.Network_cn: 他喝了杯咖啡，回来后开始认真听讲。

sentence.Network_en: Once its impurities had settled, the oil could be graded.
sentence.Network_cn: 一旦杂质沉淀下去，油就可以分级了。

entry.def: If you have a settled way of life, you stay in one place, in one job, or with one person, rather than moving around or changing.

example.ex: He decided to lead a more settled life with his partner...
example.tran: 他决定和爱人一起过一种更加安定的生活。

example.ex: His house was the only settled home I had as a child.
example.tran: 他的房子是我儿时唯一固定的家。

entry.tran: (情况、制度等)固定不变的，无变化的
entry.def: A settled situation or system stays the same all the time.

example.ex: Cats are creatures of habit — they seem to appreciate a settled routine...
example.tran: 猫是一种有固定习性的动物，它们似乎喜欢过一种有规律的生活。

example.ex: There has been a period of settled weather.
example.tran: 天气最近一段时间一直没有变化。

entry.tran: (因长期在某地生活或工作)舒适自在的，适应的,习惯的
entry.def: If you feel settled, you have been living or working in a place long enough to feel comfortable there.

example.ex: After a few years of being a diplomat, she still didn't feel settled.
example.tran: 做了几年外交官后，她还是没有适应。

means.word_mean: 1. established or decided beyond dispute or doubt;

sentences.sentence: "with details of the wedding settled she could now sleep at night"

means.word_mean: 2. established in a desired position or place; not moving about;

sentences.sentence: "I have no formed opinion about the chances of success"

Sentence.sentence: Pat's children were with their father, so she took a picnic lunch to her friends new plays, then spend the day helping her unpack and get settled
Abilene Christian settled on the devices after surveying students and finding that they did not like hauling around their laptops, but that most of them always carried a cell phone, Dr. Dickson said.
It was settled after more than two years of negotiation.

means.word_mean: 不变的,不大可能改变的,稳定的

sentences.en: Once we get settled, we must ask the neighbours in for coffee.
sentences.cn: 我们一安顿下来,就一定请邻居来家里喝咖啡。

sentences.en: Please let me have your address as soon as you are settled.
sentences.cn: 请你一安顿下来就把地址告诉我。
